content: this pattern is available for free on our website 1 happy pride we wanted to have a crochet pattern to match our knitted version and what better time than pride we re celebrating with the og pride rainbow but you can make yours in any variety you d like the pattern includes instructions for the large concrete geese and also tips for making a sweater for your miles kimble plastic buddy it is available on our website for free you can purchase the mini skeins to match our sweater as well happy stitching friends and happy pride 1 https //dyemadyarns com/blogs/patterns/crochet-goose-sweater
